```markdown
# Contributing to Daily Donkey Quotes

We love fresh quotes! To contribute:

1. Fork the repo.
2. Add your quote to `quotes.json` — as a string inside the array.
3. Follow these rules:
   - Keep it family-friendly
   - Avoid duplicates
   - Max 150 characters

Once done, submit a PR — our bot will validate your changes. Thanks! 🫏
